title: NC Lawmakers Divided Over Iran Strikes
summary: NC Republicans support US-Israel strikes on Iran, while Democrats call them unconstitutional.
charlotte_impact: Reflects deep political divisions within NC on foreign policy and executive power.

summary: Protest against U.S.-Israeli military strikes on Iran set for Romare Bearden Park.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Pickup in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole near Airline and Brown in Gastonia swallowed an unattended truck overnight.

title: Early Voting Ends for NC Primary Elections
summary: Early voting for North Carolina's primary elections ends Saturday at 3 p.m.

title: Overnight Shooting Critically Injures One
summary: Shooting in east Charlotte leaves one person critically injured in the 6500 block of E W.T. Harris Boulevard.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte

title: Woman Dies After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman dies weeks after an assault in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody as of Feb. 27, 2026.
